赛车游戏；竞速游戏；竞赛游戏
汽车赛车；赛车；赛车比赛
赛车史；赛车生涯；赛车事业

bilingual.target: 他们训练这匹小母马参加赛马。

bilingual.source: Horse racing is a very popular sport.
bilingual.target: 赛马是一项非常受欢迎的运动。
他们饲养马匹用于赛马比赛。

bilingual.source: Epsom is famous for its horse racing events.
bilingual.target: 埃普瑟姆以其赛马活动而闻名。

bilingual.source: The stallion is siring foals for the racing industry.
bilingual.target: 这匹种马正在为赛马业繁殖后代小马驹。

bilingual.source: The jockeys must maintain a strict diet to stay in shape for racing.
bilingual.target: 赛马骑师必须保持严格的饮食以保持比赛的体型。

bilingual.source: They are very good at hunting and horse racing.
bilingual.target: 他们非常擅长打猎和赛马。

bilingual.source: There have been signs that Ban'ei racing may be regaining popularity.
bilingual.target: 有迹象表明，挽曳赛马可能正在恢复人气。

bilingual.source: The sun's appearance allowed another racing fan to show off her heavily tattooed arms in a sleeveless dress.
bilingual.target: 阳光普照使另一位赛马迷得以穿着无袖连衣裙来炫耀她胳膊上的大量纹身。

yingyinNormal.en: So you're a judge, a doctor and a racing expert.
yingyinNormal.zh: 原来你不只是法官，还是个赛车高手

yingyinNormal.en: Nice racing, Padawan. You're the first to finish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 干得漂亮，我的绝地学徒。你是第一个完成的。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy and Grandpa are enjoying playing racing cars.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爷爷和猪爸爸玩得很开心。

yingyinNormal.en: Is this Lightning McQueen, the world's fastest racing machine?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是世上最快的赛车“闪电”麦坤吗？

yingyinNormal.en: George's Racing Car
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治的赛车

yingyinNormal.en: RPGs, SHMUP, SIM racing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 角色扮演，外星战役，模拟赛车?

yingyinNormal.en: Next, we need a steering wheel. Last of all, you need racing goggles and a hat. It's George's racing car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 下一个，我们需要一个方向盘。最后，你需要赛车护目镜和一个帽子。这是乔治的赛车。

yingyinNormal.en: So, what are we going to play? George wants to play racing cars. I know, let's build George a racing car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，我们要去玩什么？乔治想玩赛车。我知道，让我们给乔治造一辆赛车。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you really make a racing car, Daddy? No, but Grandpa Pig can. What? OK. I'll make a racing car for George.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真的可以做一辆赛车吗，爸爸？不，但是猪爷爷可以。什么？好吧。我会给乔治做一辆赛车。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow. I'll race you. And me. And me. I want to race too. Where's your racing car, Peppa? I don't have a racing car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哇！我要和你比赛。还有我，还有我。我也想比赛。你的赛车在哪里，佩奇？我没有赛车。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I get it! That's exactly what racing would do for me!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能理解！那赛车也能给我带来同样的东西！

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George are making a wish. Racing car. Oh. Don't tell me what it is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和乔治许下了他们的愿望。我想要一个赛车。哦，别告诉我是什么。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George are making a wish. Racing car. Oh. Don't tell me what it is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和乔治许下了他们的愿望。我想要一个赛车。哦，别告诉我是什么。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's race. Ready. Steady. Go. Daddy and Grandpa are enjoying playing racing cars.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我们来比赛吧。预备开始。猪爷爷和猪爸爸玩得很开心。

yingyinNormal.en: Not as a racing car driver? Maybe not. But in that world. Which is a long way from Downton.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是做赛车手吧？或许不，但跟那个相关的吧。跟唐顿的生活必定截然不同。

yingyinNormal.en: And so it should be. We'll go through. Unless the boys prefer to stay and talk racing cars.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是该结束了，我们走吧，除非男生们想留下谈谈赛车。

yingyinNormal.en: Here are Danny Dog, Zoe Zebra, and Pedro Pony. Hello, everyone. Look at George's racing car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是小狗丹尼，斑马佐伊和小马佩德罗。大家好。看乔治的赛车。

yingyinNormal.en: And a number of parties were racing to capture him, including, of course, the United States.
yingyinNormal.zh: 多方组织竞相要捕捉他，其中当然包括美国。

yingyinNormal.en: This racing car will be super fast. Hooray. Don't make it go too fast, Grandpa. George is only little.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦！这个赛车可以开超级快。好耶。不要弄得太快，爷爷。乔治只有这么小。

yingyinNormal.en: Survive that and you'll be racing the water, 'cause in three days' time, it's gonna hit the geyser fields.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来的还得跟洪水赛跑3天内就淹到喷泉区!

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Dragon boat <highlight>racing</highlight> is also popular in some other Asian countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 龙舟比赛在其他一些亚洲国家也很受欢迎。

examination_example.sentence: They are very good at hunting and horse <highlight>racing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们非常擅长打猎和赛马。

examination_example.sentence: Today, dragon boat <highlight>racing</highlight> is one of the most exciting water sports in the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，龙舟比赛是世界上最刺激的水上运动之一。

examination_example.sentence: Why a drill might bring on a <highlight>racing</highlight> heart？
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么钻头可能会让人心跳加速？
